message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the significant benefits it offers you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your position, but $950,000 is already a competitive price considering the significant value this product brings. To move towards a mutually agreeable outcome, I'm willing to come down slightly to $930,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $920,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be mindful of my budget.
